price: Maha suci Allah yang telah menurunkan Al-Furqān (Al-Qur`ān) kepada hamba-Nya agar dia menjadi pemberi peringatan kepada seluruh alam 1053,
arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِۦ لِيَكُونَ لِلۡعَٰلَمِينَ نَذِيرًا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī nazzala al-fur'qāna ʿalā ʿabdihi liyakūna lil'ʿālamīna nadhīran
